Summary: UFO was shaped like an upside down teardrop.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around March 5th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding outside of my work, I walked up to a customer who was smoking a cigar and looking straight out into the sky infront of us. I said, "What are you looking at"? and he replied,"Oh......... that UFO up there" and I looked at it and thought....what the bleep!!!. It's too bad I didn't have a camera and nobody else did either. It was to the right of Camelback Mountain in Scottsdale, Arizona on March 5th, 2007 at around 7:30 am. and it was shaped like an upside down teardrop. It's color was a light grey. There were no other markings on it and nothing was around it. It was slow moving toward the NE direction for roughly 5 minutes or so and then flew over the right side of the mountain out of site. When I came home that night I told my wife about it because she is into UFO's, has been for a long time now, and is always going on & on about UFO's, aliens, and I use to say "whatever". Seeing that one that day though made me a believer. My wife is happy because I don't roll my eyes up or look at her like she is nuts anymore.
